item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）今天在最高法院获得了喘息机会，但对于特朗普重返白宫的竞选活动来说，最高法院最重要的裁决还在后面

item.title: 法国农业信贷银行（Credit Agricole）将其企业和投资银行的奖金池提高了 10%以上，因为该部门去年在许多竞争对手收入疲软的趋势中逆势而上。
item.description:
Credit Agricole increased the bonus pool for its corporate and investment bank by more than 10% after the unit bucked a trend of weaker revenue at many of its rivals last year https://t.co/HPFiakfvaN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 4, 2024

item.title: 芝加哥市长布兰登-约翰逊（Brandon Johnson）正在着手改造市中心的空置楼宇，初步估计耗资 10 亿美元，以应对商业地产危机，因为商业地产的销售价格已经下降了 50%以上。
item.description:
Chicago Mayor Brandon Johnson is proceeding with a revamp of empty downtown buildings initially estimated at $1 billion in an effort to counter a commercial real estate crisis that’s cut sale prices by more than 50%. https://t.co/jG4FwC7GWj

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 4, 2024

item.title: 一艘悬挂利比里亚国旗的集装箱船在也门附近的亚丁湾发生爆炸，船上船员正在灭火

item.title: 彭博社政府记者乔-梅耶斯（Joe Mayes）告诉《城市》杂志，如果保守党想要赢得大选，本周的预算案必须成为 "杀手时刻"。

item.title: 市场参与者一直专注于判断美联储何时以及在多大程度上放缓资产负债表的松绑，却没有考虑到另一个问题
item.description:
Market participants have been so focused on determining when and how much the Fed will slow its balance-sheet unwind that they haven’t considered another wrinkle https://t.co/VzDwvo0ZEv

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 4, 2024

item.title: D.E. Shaw 是购买银行为减轻监管负担而出售的所谓盲池风险敞口的对冲基金之一
item.description:
D.E. Shaw is among hedge funds buying exposure to so-called blind pools of risk sold by banks looking to reduce their regulatory burdens https://t.co/F0Ibru5ozk

item.title: 反对党候选人科希特尔-加尔韦斯（Xochitl Galvez）表示，她正在考虑恢复墨西哥城的一个国际机场项目，该项目已被现任总统取消。

item.title: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）财富管理业务首席信息官表示，中国股市的大幅下跌还不足以成为将资金投入中国的理由
item.description:
China’s big stock-market declines aren’t enough to warrant putting money in the country, according to the CIO of Goldman Sachs' wealth-management business https://t.co/8tqwf8BxZW

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 4, 2024

item.title: 美国最大的加密货币交易所 Coinbase 表示，在不到一周的时间里，一些个人投资者的账户余额第二次为零。
item.description:
Coinbase, the biggest US cryptocurrency exchange, said some individual investors saw zero balances in their accounts for the second time in less than a week. https://t.co/0Blcj8HBMw

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 4, 2024

item.title: 石油资源丰富的委内瑞拉和圭亚那之间的边界争端出现了新的变化，圭亚那连续第三个月的石油出口量超过了邻国。
item.description:
The border dispute between oil-rich Venezuela and Guyana got a new twist with Guyana exporting more oil than its neighbor for the third straight month. https://t.co/3Y1a6dbfSd

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 4, 2024

item.title: 穆巴达拉集团（Mubadala）正盯上那些在巴西难以实现盈利的国际食品特许经营企业，以提升其在拉丁美洲最大经济体的影响力。
item.description:
Mubadala is eyeing popular international food franchises that are struggling to turn a profit in Brazil as it seeks to boost its presence in Latin America’s largest economy https://t.co/1ZiTtapyQ1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 4, 2024

item.title: 哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）的紧缩措施使阿根廷陷入更深的经济衰退，阿根廷的消费者已无计可施。

item.title: Mercury 13 是一家以女子足球俱乐部为目标的投资集团，已达成第一笔交易，购买了意大利北部科莫女子足球俱乐部的控股权。

Mercury 13, an investment group targeting women’s football clubs, has reached its first deal, purchasing a controlling stake in FC Como Women in northern Italy. https://t.co/6bvtj3MSTB

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 4, 2024

item.title: 由法国雅高集团支持的奢华生活方式酒店公司霍克斯顿酒店（Hoxton Hotels）的所有者恩尼斯摩尔公司（Ennismore）正在寻求融资，以扩大在美国的业务。
item.description:

item.title: 一个农场组织警告说，摩洛哥将需要增加小麦进口，因为又一场干旱即将来临
item.description:

item.title: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的财富管理部门正在为其客户提供一个机会，让他们在私人公司向更广泛的公众开放之前，就能购买和出售梦寐以求的股份。
item.description:
Morgan Stanley’s wealth management arm is giving its clients a chance to buy and sell coveted shares of private companies before they are available to the wider public, as startups weighing IPOs increasingly remain private for longer. https://t.co/dLpDmT8yUK

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 4, 2024
